lead_paragraph: A Florida doctor says he used a stem cell technique on Bartolo Colon, who is suddenly an important part of the Yankees’ rotation.
snippet: A Florida doctor says he used a stem cell technique on Bartolo Colon, who is suddenly an important part of the Yankees’ rotation.
